name: ZilRollToken

attributes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.

renounceOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@dev Transfers control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: _transferOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@title Destructible
@dev Base contract that can be destroyed by owner. All funds in contract will be sent to the owner.
attributes.name: Destructible

attributes.documentation: @dev Transfers the current balance to the owner and terminates the contract.
attributes.name: destroy
Claimable

attributes.documentation: @dev Modifier throws if called by any account other than the pendingOwner.
attributes.name: onlyPendingOwner

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to set the pendingOwner address.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation: @dev Allows the pendingOwner address to finalize the transfer.
attributes.name: claimOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@title Pausable
@dev Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism.
attributes.name: Pausable

attributes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
attributes.name: whenNotPaused

attributes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
attributes.name: whenPaused

attributes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state
attributes.name: pause

attributes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
attributes.name: unpause
ERC20Basic

attributes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: add

@title Standard ERC20 token
 * @dev Implementation of the basic standard token.
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20
Based on code by FirstBlood: https://github.com/Firstbloodio/token/blob/master/smart_contract/FirstBloodToken.sol
attributes.name: StandardToken
transferFrom
approve
allowance
increaseApproval
decreaseApproval

attributes.documentation:
Zil Roll Token is used to fund the initial capital of ZillRoll, a provably-fair
and transparent dice gaming on the Zilliqa network. All profits (if any) shall be
periodically and proportionately distributed between token holders.
attributes.name: ZilRollToken

attributes.documentation:
The listed addresses are not valid recipients of tokens.
     * 0x0 - the zero address is not valid
this - the contract itself should not receive tokens
owner - the owner has all the initial tokens, but cannot receive any back
attributes.name: validDestination

attributes.documentation: Constructor - instantiates token supply and allocates entire balance to the contract owner (msg.sender).
